ygData.subject: RE: Best looking clerics?....
ygData.msgSnippet: My own (baby) cleric is a dark elf. And when I recently created a bard, I was wishing SHE could be a dark elf because I just love the way darkies look in their
ygData.messageBody:
My own (baby) cleric is a dark elf. And when I recently created a bard,
I was wishing SHE could be a dark elf because I just love the way
darkies look in their armor!

Sarah Heacock


>-----Original Message-----
>From: Sirensa Qi'Seraph [mailto:Sirensa@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, November 17, 1999 1:36 PM
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Best looking clerics?....
>
>
>From: "Sirensa Qi'Seraph" <Sirensa@...>
>
>>Make a halfing halfings rock, de's suck as clerics, horrible starting
>>stats.
>
>Just to clear the records so no one believes that crap about de clerics
>sucking - My DE cleric does NOT suck, she does quite well, as anyone in her
>guild and group can testify. Starting stats are just that.. starting and
>THEY CAN BE MODIFIED with stat increasing equipment.
>
>Not to mention the person asked who LOOKED best. The question has nothing
>to do with skill or stats, but looks. To say a DE sucks is just spouting
>off about something you know nothing about.
>
>~Sirensa
>DE cleric... and no I don't suck
